channel.title: software development on First Law of Robotics
channel.description: Recent content in software development on First Law of Robotics

item.title: What is RFCs and how to use them
item.description: Today my colleague shared that they started to use RFCs inside of their development team. I was surprised in a way that I thought “why it’s not a common practice?”. I know that it’s not a common practice because I never used it in my previous companies. But I think it’s a good practice and I want to share it with you. What is RFC? RFC stands for Request for Comments.
